name: Performapal Trampolynx
text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 card in either player's Pendulum Zone; return it to the hand.
pendulum_text: When you Pendulum Summon a monster(s): You can target 1 card in either player's Pendulum Zone; return it to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Performapal Trampolynx" once per turn.
